name: Facebook Circular Round Profile Pictures
description:
Simply makes most profile pictures on Facebook round or circular.
Works with the new layout
css:
@-moz-document domain("facebook.com") {

/* Circular Profile Icons */
._rw, /*main post in feed (not timeline), current user sidebar*/
._54ru, /*comments and actioned post*/
._50c7, /*wall view post*/
._54rt, /*timeline view post*/
div.uiScaledImageContainer.bigPic > img.scaledImageFitWidth.img, /*X friends like this page*/
._ry, /*poll voter*/
.fbQuestionFacepileMoreItem._43q8._43q7._43qa, /*poll +x people*/
._8o._8r.lfloat._ohe > img.img, /*created group*/
.img._50dv, /*messages conversation*/
img.profilePhoto, ._5ys_ > img, /*chat tab, typing indicator*/
.MercuryThreadImage.mrm.lfloat._ohe > img, /*new message list*/
img.photo._8o.img.lfloat, /*inviting to event*/
#typeahead_list_u_m_8 > li.user > img, .uiTypeaheadView > .search > .member > a > img, /*add to group*/
._29m > ._29h._29l > .img, /* friend req popup */
.img._8o._8r._33h, /* notifications popup*/
a._8o._8t.lfloat > div > div > img, /*friend requests page*/
img._s0._54rs.img, /*suggested pokes*/
._s0._rv.img:not(.friendPhoto), /*hover popup, profile friends list, not top friends on timeline*/
._7ls, /*hover popup shadow*/

._6lm._4m78, ._6ll.lfloat._ohe, /*feed inline preview*/
._5080, ._5080 > ._gxb._507_, ._5080 > ._gxb._507_ > img, /*feed inline page preview shadow*/
/*a._8o._8t.lfloat._ohe:not(.external):not(.uiVideoThumb):not(.uiPhotoThumb) > img.img:not(._4yrc), /*NEW likes in timeline sidebar, not(apps)*/
.profilePic.img, /*timeline top*/
._58gg, /*NEW timeline top frame*/
#profile_pic_education, #fbTimelineHeadline > .name > .photoContainer > div > .profilePicThumb, /*timeline top shadow*/
img._20h, /*graph search quick results dropdown*/
a._7kf._8o._8s.lfloat > img.img, /*graph search results page*/
._8o._8t.lfloat > .uiScaledImageContainer > .scaledImageFitWidth.img /*birthday in news feed prominent*/
{ border-radius: 1000px !important; }


.clearfix > a > .listMemberFacepile, /* group collage thumbnail */
._55lt, /* group message collage thumbnail */
a.lfloat > div > .uiScaledImageContainer.profilePic /*feed inline preview*/
{ border-radius: 1000px !important; overflow: hidden; }


/* Remove squared shadows/borders */
.UFIImageBlockImage:after, /*timeline view comments*/
.UFIReplyActorPhotoWrapper:after,
._51wa:after, /*timeline view post*/
.profileLink:after, ._5ys_:after, /*chat tab, typing indicator*/
.navLink:after /*NEW top bar your pic*/
{ background: none !important; }
._5d3_:after, /*places section on wall*/
._5v9u:after, .UFIImageBlockImage:after, /*event posts and comments*/
.fbxWelcomeBoxBlock:after, /*NEW sidebar your pic*/
._55lp > ._56p9:after, /*NEW chat sidebar*/
._gx8::after, ._ph4._ph5, /*timeline sidebar pages borders*/
.fbQuestionFacepileItem > a.link:after /*poll option respondants*/
{ border: none !important; } 

/* Timeline sidebar pages text alignment */
._ph4._ph5 > ._4-1._4_98.fwb { text-align: center !important; }

/* Graph Search Results Cards */
div._7ke._ajr._1s8._3u1 { border-radius: 85px 3px 3px 85px !important; }

/* Profile Friends List (facebook.com/user/friends) */
._5q6s::after { border: none !important; }
li._698 { border-radius: 50px 4px 4px 50px !important; }
.clearfix._5qo4 { margin: 0px !important; }

}
